title: 23- President Twitter and the First Amendment
description: Can Trump block people on Twitter? It turns out, the First Amendment has something to say about that.
author: roman@99pi.org (Roman Mars)
content:encoded: Can Trump block people on Twitter? It turns out, the First Amendment has something to say about that.
